text: Kenneth "Chi" McBride (born September 23, 1961) is an American actor. He played Captain Lou Grover of the Five-0 taskforce in the CBS drama Hawaii Five-0 until the show ended in 2020. He was in the movies Gone in 60 Seconds; The Terminal; I, Robot; Roll Bounce; and Draft Day. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Chi McBride at MTV.com Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Chicago
title: Chi McBride
